name: Add Zoho Creator records from new Google Forms responses
description:
Every time a new response is entered on your Google Form, Make will automatically add a new order to your Zoho Creator application. 

This template uses the [Order Management application](https://www.zoho.com/creator/order-management.html) from Zoho Creator.

Note that these fields are mandatory in Zoho Creator so either your Google Form needs to collect them or you will need to use static values:
1) Order Date
2) Customer
3) Sales Owner
4) Estimated Delivery Date
5) Tax
6) Subtotal (optional)
7) Net Total (optional)

The Google Form responses need to be [stored in a Google Sheet spreadsheet.](https://support.google.com/docs/answer/2917686?hl=en)

The sample spreadsheet is [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16pVYFrE-0v2L6R71lsTf3s-vaZqWfVKWvLYXd0r9aTI/edit?usp=sharing)

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking on the clock icon on the first module.
